decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing control elements and synergy between Stoneblade cards to disrupt the opponent's strategy while gaining incremental advantage through card advantage and removal spells. The deck aims to control the game through counter spells, removal, and powerful planeswalkers such as Teferi, Time Raveler, while also utilizing cards like Stoneforge Mystic to quickly assemble powerful equipment like Batterskull. Additionally, the inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value by blinking key permanents for additional card advantage and tempo advantage.

The main concept of the deck is to lock down the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Chalice of the Void while quickly ramping out powerful threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Dragon creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The inclusion of cards like The One Ring and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker add additional threats and versatility to the deck, making it a formidable force in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counter spells like Daze and Force of Will while also utilizing card draw and selection with Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck includes a variety of creature threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty to apply pressure on the opponent. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes disruptive lands like Wasteland.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly get powerful creatures into the graveyard, using cards like Grief and Entomb, then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This allows the player to cheat powerful creatures into play early in the game, overwhelming their opponent with big threats. The deck also includes disruption in the form of cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect its game plan. Overall, the deck aims to execute its combo strategy efficiently and aggressively to win the game.

The main focus of the deck is to combine aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler with efficient counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Mishra's Bauble and Brainstorm to maintain a consistent flow of threats. The use of efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat allows the deck to deal with opposing threats effectively. A key strategy is to maintain control of the board while steadily advancing towards victory through consistent aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on using artifacts to generate mana and control the board while assembling key pieces to create a powerful combo. It combines cards like Grim Monolith and Paradox Engine with synergies like Urza's Bauble and Mox Opal to generate mana and draw cards efficiently. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional utility and synergy with artifacts, while cards like The One Ring and Mystic Forge offer powerful win conditions. The deck aims to create a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful artifact-based combo.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping out powerful creatures and disruptive spells to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Chalice of the Void, Blood Moon, and Trinisphere, it can disrupt the opponent's game plan while aggressively attacking with creatures like Broadside Bombardiers, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Fury. The goal is to put pressure on the opponent early on and prevent them from effectively casting spells, leading to a swift victory through aggressive plays and denying the opponent resources.

The main concept of this deck is to establish a control strategy by utilizing artifact prison elements to lock down the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan. By casting Chalice of the Void on key converted mana costs, utilizing powerful artifacts like Shadowspear and Nettlecyst, and generating mana through cards like Lotus Petal and Mox Opal, the deck aims to control the battlefield and outvalue the opponent. With a strong mana base including Urza's Saga and Ancient Tomb, as well as versatile cards like Phyrexian Metamorph and Mishra's Bauble, the deck seeks to dominate the game and secure victory.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to use aggressive creature threats combined with artifact synergies to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck includes cards that can disrupt the opponent's game plan, such as Ensnaring Bridge and Nihil Spellbomb, while also utilizing cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate additional value. With a mix of creatures, artifacts, and powerful spells, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game through a combination of creature damage and disruptive elements.

This deck aims to quickly disrupt the opponent's game plan with efficient removal spells and disruptive creatures while also ramping up mana with cards like Up the Beanstalk. Leyline of the Guildpact provides a boost to the deck's creatures, making them harder to deal with. Reanimate allows for powerful creatures to be brought back from the graveyard. The deck also includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Scion of Draco and Orcish Bowmasters to pressure the opponent. Overall, the deck combines elements of aggro, disruption, and ramp to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

Utilizing a combination of graveyard manipulation and efficient creatures, the deck aims to quickly put powerful threats into play by reanimating them. It relies on disruption and protection spells to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck's key strength lies in its ability to quickly assemble a threatening board state, overwhelming opponents before they can establish their own game plan. By efficiently using resources and maximally exploiting the graveyard as a resource, the deck can consistently threaten to win the game in a few turns.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler in combination with efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Force of Will to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Wasteland and Daze, while leveraging card advantage with cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder. The inclusion of cards like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower adds versatility and power to the deck, making it a formidable force in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.
